PHRASE.LANG: These shoes might not match, but we won't be the ones to tell that to whoever wears them. [#Legal]
Ces chaussures peuvent sembler dépareillées, mais gardez-vous de le faire remarquer à leur propriétaire. [#Legal]
Diese Schuhe mögen nicht zusammenpassen, aber wir werden es dem Träger bestimmt nicht sagen. [#Legal]
Anche se non dovessero abbinarsi al vestito, non sarebbe saggio farlo notare a chi le indossa. [#Legal]
Estos zapatos podrán no estar conjuntados, pero no seremos nosotros quienes se lo digamos a quienes los llevan. [#Legal]
잘 어울리지는 않는 신발이지만 감히 그 이야기를 하는 사람은 없겠죠? [#Legal]
These shoes might not match, but we won't be the ones to tell that to whoever wears them. [#Legal]
這對鞋可能不太搭配，但我們不會告訴穿上它的人。 [#Legal]
這對鞋可能不太搭配，但我們不會告訴穿上它的人。 [#Legal]
These shoes might not match, but we won't be the ones to tell that to whoever wears them. [#Legal]
